sentences.en: A previous Pap smear with an unexplained glandular abnormality.
sentences.cn: 前次巴氏涂片有不能解释的腺体细胞不正常.

sentences.en: Abnormality of free radical production will lead many diseases.
sentences.cn: 自由基产生异常,将导致诸多疾病过程.

sentences.en: An ultrasound scan can detect abnormality in a fetus.
sentences.cn: 超声波扫描能够检测出胎儿是否畸形.

sentences.en: An uncertain proportion of patients, possibly about 10 per cent, have a third protein abnormality - amyloidosis.
sentences.cn: 还有一部分(比例不确定)病人可能占10%, 有第三种异常蛋白 —— 淀粉样变性.

sentences.en: Analise financial report to find out and confirm abnormality.
sentences.cn: 分析财务报告,发现和确认不正常情况.

sentences.en: Caitlin was born with a life-threatening heart abnormality.
sentences.cn: 凯特琳患有可能致命的先天性心脏畸形。

sentences.en: Conclusion Chromosome abnormality is one of the causes of spontaneous abortions.
sentences.cn: 结论:染色体异常是导致反复自然流产的原因之一.

sentences.en: Further scans are required to confirm the diagnosis of an abnormality.
sentences.cn: 需要进一步扫描来确诊是否出现异常病变。

sentences.en: However, a pre - existing renal abnormality will increase the risk of rupture.
sentences.cn: 然而, 若存在肾脏的先天性异常则会增加此种破裂的风险.

sentences.en: Objective To study the relationship between chromosome abnormality and repeated spontaneous abortion.
sentences.cn: 目的:讨论患者夫妇外周血染色体异常与反复流产的关系.

sentences.en: Results Fourty - four ( 10.6 % ) of subjects were found to have chromosome abnormality.
sentences.cn: 结果发现44例患者有染色体异常,频率为10.6%.

sentences.en: She has shown no abnormality in intelligence or in disposition.
sentences.cn: 她在智力或性情上都未显示出任何反常.

sentences.en: tests that can detect genetic abnormalities in the foetus
sentences.cn: 可以查出胎儿遗传变异的化验

sentences.en: The abnormality mitral stenosis was in myocardium, not in the valve.
sentences.cn: 二尖瓣狭窄的病变是在心肌而不是在瓣膜.

sentences.en: The most common metabolic abnormality was hypocitraturia, followed by hypercalciuria.
sentences.cn: 在多钙尿后最常见的代谢性异常为枸橼酸盐尿.

sentences.en: This abnormality can be appreciated by carefully palpating the pulse in such patients.
sentences.cn: 当小心地触诊这类病人的脉搏时,可以辨别出这种异常.

words.tran_cn: 反常的，不规则的；变态的
反常地；变态地；不规则地

trans.tran_cn: 反常，变态，畸形，不合常规的现象或事件
trans.tran_en: an abnormal feature, especially something that is wrong with part of someone’s body
